de: Wir versuchen herauszufinden, inwieweit du schauspielerischen Aktivitäten nachgegangen bist. Das beinhaltet Theater, Improvisation, Rollenspiele etc. Denk daran: Es gibt keine richtigen oder falschen Antworten – dies ist kein Test. Bitte beantworte alle Fragen so ehrlich und genau, wie du kannst – das ist sehr wichtig.
en: We are trying to find out about your engagement with drama over the last three months. This includes theatre, improvisation, role-play, etc. Remember: There are no right and wrong answers – this is not a test. Please answer all the questions as honestly and accurately as you can – this is very important.
de_f: Wir versuchen herauszufinden, inwieweit du schauspielerischen Aktivitäten nachgegangen bist. Das beinhaltet Theater, Improvisation, Rollenspiele etc. Denk daran: Es gibt keine richtigen oder falschen Antworten – dies ist kein Test. Bitte beantworte alle Fragen so ehrlich und genau, wie du kannst – das ist sehr wichtig.
it: We are trying to find out about your engagement with drama over the last three months. This includes theatre, improvisation, role-play, etc. Remember: There are no right and wrong answers – this is not a test. Please answer all the questions as honestly and accurately as you can – this is very important.
es: We are trying to find out about your engagement with drama over the last three months. This includes theatre, improvisation, role-play, etc. Remember: There are no right and wrong answers – this is not a test. Please answer all the questions as honestly and accurately as you can – this is very important.

de: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten nach der Schule Theater gespielt, z. B. in einer Schul-AG?
en: In the last three months, how many times per week did you do drama right after school, e.g. as part of an after school club?
de_f: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten nach der Schule Theater gespielt, z. B. in einer Schul-AG?
it: In the last three months, how many times per week did you do drama right after school, e.g. as part of an after school club?
es: In the last three months, how many times per week did you do drama right after school, e.g. as part of an after school club?

de: An wie vielen Abenden hast du in den letzten drei Monaten Theater gespielt?
en: In the last three months, how many evenings per week did you spend doing drama?
de_f: An wie vielen Abenden hast du in den letzten drei Monaten Theater gespielt?
it: In the last three months, how many evenings per week did you spend doing drama?
es: In the last three months, how many evenings per week did you spend doing drama?

de: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten am Wochenende Theater gespielt?
en: In the last three months, how often did you do drama on weekends?
de_f: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten am Wochenende Theater gespielt?
it: In the last three months, how often did you do drama on weekends?
es: In the last three months, how often did you do drama on weekends?

de: Sehr oft (7-mal oder öfter pro Woche)
en: Very often (7 or more times a week)
de_f: Sehr oft (7-mal oder öfter pro Woche)
it: Very often (7 or more times a week)
es: Very often (7 or more times a week)

de: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten während deiner Freizeit Theater gespielt?
en: In the last three months, I spent my free time doing drama ...
de_f: Wie oft hast du in den letzten drei Monaten während deiner Freizeit Theater gespielt?
it: In the last three months, I spent my free time doing drama ...
es: In the last three months, I spent my free time doing drama ...
